bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.description:
v0.11.0 PAI-PROD How to reproduce
Go to Virtual Cluster page, find a VC with utilization >0 (vc name: be*e), click on the View Jobs link. go back to VC page; select another vc whose utilization is 0 (vc name: xi*e, click on the view jobs link
Expectation View jobs in the job list page Actual The jobs shows the previous vc's (be*e) job list. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/56131274-92eb6680-5fb9-11e9-8f1c-f61bbe83dda3.png></denchmark-link>
